channel.title: RSCD V25 help (few errors)
channel.description:
Hi, I was using divinepk but found it too buggy for my tastes, and heard that RSCD v25 was the way to go. I am having a few issues setting up RSCD V25.. So here is the first thing that went wrong.
Heres how I did it since I ventured off of the original TUT (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,309101.0.html)
First I downloaded the Rscd v25 Source, Rscd v25 Www Files, and Rscd .sql Database. Next (instead of xamplite because I never could get it working) I got WAMP (http://sourceforge.net/projects/wampserver/files/WampServer%202/WampServer%202.1/WampServer2.1e-x32.exe/download)
Then I loaded PHP my admin, created the database rscd, then imported the .sql file. Afterwards I took the wamp WWW folder, deleted it, and pasted in the one I downloaded. I am pretty sure I set up my paths correctly, if needed I can update this post with pictures of those too. So I compiled it (to see if it would) said it was successful... so I loaded run_lserver, then ran run_server. Here is the first thing thats wrong..
1) Attempting to connect to LS.... [URL=http://img14.imageshack.us/i/attemptingtoconnectols.png/][IMG]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/1554/attemptingtoconnectols.png[/img][/URL] (it basically kept doing this till I closed it, also a post off another topic told me to go to ant\bin and edit the ant.bat and put a pause in there.. along with putting localhost instead of my IP in LS.. which made the loginserver/engine work apparently)
Also, ever since I added the www files and loaded up local host I got this at the top of my screen.
[URL=http://img855.imageshack.us/i/errord.png/][IMG]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/1858/errord.png[/img][/URL]
Then I tried to register a character.. when I clicked confirm / make the account it brought up this screen.
[URL=http://img695.imageshack.us/i/404notfoundn.png/][IMG]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/79/404notfoundn.png[/img][/URL]
So then I refresh the page, and it says I am logged in. So I try and log out and I get the blue screen again.
Now the final error came after all this, in phpmyadmin.
[URL=http://img820.imageshack.us/i/phpmyadminerror.png/][IMG]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/1500/phpmyadminerror.png[/img][/URL]
What did I do wrong? :confused:
Thanks in advance for any help, and if you need more information to help figure out this issue please let me know.
--Steven
::EDIT::
Can I just use the WWW file from divinepk? That worked good (just didnt have a forum). Didn't know if they can mix and match :D

item.title: RSCD V25 help (few errors)
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

As far as SQL injections goes, it’s better (as there is none). Layout, you’re going to have to do something about. Also the FluxBB is (NOW) outdated so you’re going to need to download the latest from flux unless you want to take the risks that come with outdated forum software

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD V25 help (few errors)
item.dc:creator: @XxIneedhelpxX XxIneedhelpxX
item.description:
@XxIneedhelpxX wrote:

Got a link to the DL of the WWW files from sw0o0sh? Also I found the one that I am using atm (the one downloaded in that tut) had many bugs… is sw0o0sh’s fixed / better? I am assuming yes since you said I should use it.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD V25 help (few errors)
item.dc:creator: @XxIneedhelpxX XxIneedhelpxX
item.description:
@XxIneedhelpxX wrote:

Hi, I was using divinepk but found it too buggy for my tastes, and heard that RSCD v25 was the way to go. I am having a few issues setting up RSCD V25… So here is the first thing that went wrong.

Heres how I did it since I ventured off of the original TUT (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,309101.0.html)

First I downloaded the Rscd v25 Source, Rscd v25 Www Files, and Rscd .sql Database. Next (instead of xamplite because I never could get it working) I got WAMP (http://sourceforge.net/projects/wampserver/files/WampServer%202/WampServer%202.1/WampServer2.1e-x32.exe/download)

Then I loaded PHP my admin, created the database rscd, then imported the .sql file. Afterwards I took the wamp WWW folder, deleted it, and pasted in the one I downloaded. I am pretty sure I set up my paths correctly, if needed I can update this post with pictures of those too. So I compiled it (to see if it would) said it was successful… so I loaded run_lserver, then ran run_server. Here is the first thing thats wrong…

  1. Attempting to connect to LS…

    (it basically kept doing this till I closed it, also a post off another topic told me to go to ant\bin and edit the ant.bat and put a pause in there… along with putting localhost instead of my IP in LS… which made the loginserver/engine work apparently)

Also, ever since I added the www files and loaded up local host I got this at the top of my screen.

Then I tried to register a character… when I clicked confirm / make the account it brought up this screen.

So then I refresh the page, and it says I am logged in. So I try and log out and I get the blue screen again.

Now the final error came after all this, in phpmyadmin.

What did I do wrong?

Thanks in advance for any help, and if you need more information to help figure out this issue please let me know.

–Steven

::EDIT::

Can I just use the WWW file from divinepk? That worked good (just didnt have a forum). Didn’t know if they can mix and match

Read full topic
